section.name: CreateNew
section.p: Clicking [b]Create New[/b] will create a new [i]empty[/i] report.

section.name: Delete
section.p: [color=Red]WARNING:[/color] this action is not currently reversible.

section.name: Generate
section.p: Executes the currently selected report after prompting for where to save it to.
This process can take a while, especially for reports containing multiple files.

section.name: ReportList
section.p: All existing reports are displayed in the list on the left.

section.name: Configure
section.p: Files and folders have to be added to a report for it to be possible to generate anything.
Directories will include all texture graph files in them, and if [b]Recurse Folders[/b] is checked it will also include texture graphs in sub-folders.
The [b]Visual Overview[/b] report is the most useful when generating a report on a large number files.
